sources.description: Title: And So They Were Married Summary: A bitter divorcée and a grumpy widower find themselves stuck in a hotel that is cut off from the outside by a snowstorm. Although both have no intention of getting married again, they begin... Directed by: Elliott Nugent Actors: Melvyn Douglas, Mary Astor, Edith Fellows Production Company: Columbia Pictures Release Date: 10 May 1936 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A bitter divorcée and a grumpy widower find themselves stuck in a hotel that is cut off from the outside by a snowstorm. Although both have no intention of getting married again, they begin to fall for each other. Their children, however, are determined to see that the "romance" never gets off the ground and do everything they can to see that they are kept apart.
